content: patterns for trigger mittens with a separate forefinger can be found in wartime knitting books originally intended to wear while shooting i find the re also useful if you use a walking stick with a flat handle these are held with the forefinger in front of the stick and the other three behind and that finger can get very cold these mittens are sized to fit a woman s hand but instructions are included on adjusting them to fit as they are knitted all my ravelry patterns are free to download but if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to the british liver trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease you can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here 1 happy knitting 1 https //www justgiving com/page/frankie-brown
